bio.desc: I am a software engineer at Sense helping build out their data infrastructure. I primarily write code in Python.  Before that, I was a software engineer at Yahoo helping create their new line of mobile search products. Specifically, I helped build application servers, and wrote code in Scala, Java, and Javascript. Before Yahoo, I interned at AddThis (later acquired by Oracle) and graduated UVA in 2015 (BS CS). My email is bobby.pourkazemi@gmail.com.
